feed.title: Latest activity on "Controlling defence, security and dual-use strategic exports"
feed.subtitle: Recently associated

entry.title: Exchange of notes (UK Note) concerning ITAR rule change dated 11 August 2011
entry.content:
Document issued in conjunction with the International Trade in Arms Regulations (ITAR) rule change dated 11 August 2011.

This note was issued in conjunction with an equivalent US Note.

For related guidance please refer to our guide exporting military goods to the United States

entry.title: Exchange of notes (US Note) concerning ITAR rule change dated 11 August 2011
entry.content:
Document issued in conjunction with the International Trade in Arms Regulations (ITAR) rule change dated 11 August 2011.

This note was issued in conjunction with an equivalent UK Note.

For related guidance please refer to our guide exporting military goods to the United States

entry.title: Strategic export controls
entry.content: The Foreign & Commonwealth Office’s Strategic Export Controls Reports demonstrate the Government’s commitment to transparent and responsible controls on British arms exports.The quarterly and annual reports give details by destination, of physical exports and equipment licensed for export.
